if test `grep -c applications /etc/profile.d/modules.sh` = 0; then echo 'export MODULEPATH=/opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.sh fi if test `grep -c applications /etc/profile.d/modules.csh` = 0; then echo 'setenv MODULEPATH /opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.csh fi
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/gamess
#%Module1.0 set fftwHome /opt/gamess module-whatis "gamess" module-whatis "Version: 1.2009" module-whatis "Description: games" module-whatis "Compiler: gnu Parallel library: sockets Math Library: gnu" prepend-path PATH $fftwHome
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.2009"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/fftw/.version.1.2009 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/fftw/.version
